meanings.definition: Having an excessive interest in oneself
meanings.sent1: She always talks about herself, displaying a narcissistic attitude.
meanings.sent2: His narcissistic behavior makes it hard for him to consider others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: At the party, his narcissistic obsession with selfies became a running joke.
meanings.sent4: Her narcissistic need for constant admiration is like a bottomless pit.
meanings.sent5: The mirror seemed to reflect his narcissistic image back at him endlessly.

meanings.sent1: The narcissistic cat only cared about its own comfort.
meanings.sent2: Being narcissistic, she rarely asked others about their day.
meanings.sent3: It was almost comical how narcissistic he was about his own achievements.
meanings.sent4: Her narcissistic behavior created a barrier between her and her friends.
meanings.sent5: The narcissistic character in the story was always the center of attention.

meanings.definition: Showing an inflated sense of self-importance
meanings.sent1: His narcissistic need for praise overshadowed his actual accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: The narcissistic boss believed he was the only one capable of making decisions.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the narcissistic actor demand special treatment on set.
meanings.sent4: Her narcissistic behavior was like a bright neon sign screaming for attention.
meanings.sent5: The politician's narcissistic speeches were filled with grandiose claims and self-praise.
